sentences.english: Yesterday I made mistakes, then I correct them today and warn myself not to mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我犯错了，于是我今天改过并告诫自己不可重犯。

sentences.english: You think that by saying I'm sorry all the past can be corrected.
sentences.chinese: 你以为说声对不起，过去的一切就能改过来吗？

sentences.english: It was hard for me to ask for a change, so I just went ahead.
sentences.chinese: 再改过去很难，我只好将功补过。

sentences.english: The shock of losing my purse cured me of all my former absent-mindedness.
sentences.chinese: 失去钱包的打击，使我一改过去心不在焉的坏毛病。

sentences.english: Shan sleeps alone in two unheated rooms converted from a small barn.
sentences.chinese: 珊珊独自睡在两间从畜圈改过来的房子里。

sentences.english: It would change the very idea of working on a computer altogether.
sentences.chinese: 它会一改过去完全使用电脑来工作的想法。

sentences.english: The important thing to remember is, "If you have faults, don't be afraid to change."
sentences.chinese: 要紧的是“过则勿惮改”，不要怕改过。

sentences.english: He decided to turn over a new leaf and study harder.
sentences.chinese: 他决定要改过自新而且用功读书。

sentences.english: A bad habit in a child should be nipped in the bud.
sentences.chinese: 应该尽早将小小孩的坏习惯改过来。

sentences.english: It's time you amended your ways.
sentences.chinese: 是你改过自新的时候了。

sentences.english: So he then turned over a new leaf and decided to drop the pranks and tried his best to study.
sentences.chinese: 所以后来他改过自新，决定停止做恶作剧并努力学习。

sentences.english: Well, now Asahi can just change his last name through?
sentences.chinese: 那么现在旭刚可以将自己的姓改过来吗？

sentences.english: This warranty shall not apply to any unit that has been repaired or altered other than by the manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 此保固不包含已送修过或别制造商改过的部份。

sentences.english: Never too old to learn; never too late to turn.
sentences.chinese: 学习不厌老，改过不嫌迟。

sentences.english: I just wanted to get my own heart right before God.
sentences.chinese: 我只希望能够在上帝面前改过自新。

sentences.english: Correct your errors in your paper, if any.
sentences.chinese: 把你的论文中的错误都改过来，如果有的话。
